title: 2 months and still
body:
can't transfer my account :| 

wtf riot ;-;

replies.body: HollyMonster has been delivering updates on those account transfers on her [**post over here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update). They ran into some issues that are still being worked out.
Yeah said it would be up and running on 20th November and I am still waiting. Read somewhere that it may take up 4 weeks... I hope Riot give us some sort of compensation.
